trans-unit.source: The object where the event handler is attached.
trans-unit.target: O objeto em que o manipulador de eventos está anexado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle keyboard-related routed events.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará eventos roteados relacionados ao teclado.

trans-unit.source: No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento de teclado existente nos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> delegate.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> base class as its event data class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> usa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> base de sua classe de dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> serves as the base class for the more specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> event data classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> serve como a classe base para o mais específico <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> classes de dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: These event data classes are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> delegates, and those delegates are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Essas classes de dados de evento são usadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> delegados e os delegados são usados por existente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] eventos como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
